trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for data source objects that get data by using LINQ queries.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
The default data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
Gets the data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> object.
The name of the data source view to get.
The default data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
Gets a collection of names that represent views that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
A collection of names that represent views that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
Loads the state of the values in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control that must be persisted.
An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> object by using the event data.
The event data
Occurs when a query is added to or removed from a data source control.
To be added.
Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> class.
Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
The saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.

Tracks view-state changes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the control.
Updates the parameter values that have changed since the previous request.
